items.value: %113% has been following a %111% %112% named %00@ and it appears that %83b is tracking the location of something important. Do you want to intervene?
%113% continued to follow %00@ and found out that %83b was studying %04@.
%113% tried hard to follow %00@, but unfortunately, %00@ gave him the slip.
%113% found out that %00@ found the location of a treasure located at %04@. %113% arrived at %04@ before %00@ and successfully looted the treasure.
%113% tried to get ahead of %00@ but go lost in the process, and has not reported back since then, something bad must've happened.
%113% stops tracking %00@. It has better things to do.
%113% got lost trying to get ahead of %00@.
